title: Zucchini Noodles (Zoodles)
directions: Drizzle EVOO in medium-high heat pan. Add sliced Roma tomato and sprinkle with garlic powder, salt and Italian seasoning.
While tomato is cooking, spiral the unpeeled zucchini.
Saute tomato until it begins to soften and skin wrinkles.
Add zucchini spirals to pan and cook for four minutes, stirring twice.
